name: Minesweeper by Koomplr
description:
I was very unhappy playing Microsoft's version of Minesweeper - Full of ads, with a paid subscription to remove them! So I thought 'why not make my own, and put it online for free.' And so I did! 

I'm well aware there are dozens of minesweeper clones around, and mine (get it) isn't particularly unique (although you can change the colours a little). The project was made simply so you could enjoy playing minesweeper on the computer without the internet and without annoying ads. Enjoy!

P.S. there is currently no custom mode, it might be added in the future.
